mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, TRIM(d.dealAmount) recentPrice, d.area, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) join housedeal d on h.aptCode = h.aptCode where dongCode = #{dong} and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO housesale (aptCode, title, content, dealAmount, floor, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, room, userid) VALUES (#{aptCode},#{title}, #{content},#{dealAmount},#{floor}, date_format(now(),'%Y'),date_format(now(),'%m'),date_format(now(),'%d'),#{area},#{room},#{userId});
insert into member (userid, username, userpwd, email, joindate) values (#{userid}, #{username}, md5(#{userpwd}), #{email}, now());
